text: Dawn is an American brand of dishwashing liquid. It is owned by Procter & Gamble. It was introduced in 1973. In the United States, it is the best- selling brand of dishwashing liquid. Dawn products(their items that you can buy) are also used to get rid of grease. They were used to get rid of oil on animals like during the Exxon Valdez and Deepwater Horizon oil spills. == References == == Other websites == * Official Dawn website Category:1973 establishments in the United States
title: Dawn (brand)
